mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK ( BOOKMARKNO, FK_ID, FK_BOARDNO, CREATEDATMARK ) VALUES ( BOOKMARK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{fk_id}, #{fk_boardNo}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT bm.bookmarkno AS bookmarkNo, bm.fk_id AS fk_id, bm.fk_boardno AS fk_boardNo, bm.createdatmark AS createdAtMark, b.board_title AS boardName FROM bookmark bm JOIN board b ON bm.fk_boardno = b.board_no WHERE bm.fk_id = #{fk_id} ORDER BY bm.createdatmark DESC
